For any positive integer $ n$, let \[f(n) = \begin{cases} \log_8{n}, & \text{if }\log_8{n}\text{ is rational,} \\
0, & \text{otherwise.} \end{cases}\] What is $ \sum_{n = 1}^{1997}{f(n)}$?\\
\\
$ \textbf{(A)}\ \log_8{2047}\qquad \textbf{(B)}\ 6\qquad \textbf{(C)}\ \frac {55}{3}\qquad \textbf{(D)}\ \frac {58}{3}\qquad \textbf{(E)}\ 585$
